message: Bob, I'm offering you my product for $13,000. I believe this is a fair price considering its value to you. Let me know if you're interested.
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $10,500. I believe that's a more reasonable price considering the value of the product to me.
Bob, I understand you're looking for a good deal, but $10,500 is significantly below my minimum. I'm willing to meet you halfway. How about $11,250? It's still a fair price for both of us.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit above my budget. How about we try $10,800? I'm willing to compromise, but I need to stay within my budget.
